attributes.action: Resign as an MP and call an immediate General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I firmly believe that you Gordon Brown are GUILTY of destroying the democratic principals of the United Kingdom by denying the People the right to vote in a Referendom that was in your party's election manifesto to which you agreed with regard to giving more power to the EU which is totally undemocratic.
I therefore ask for your immediate resignation as Prime Minister, a position to which you did not have the backing of the people so showing that you do not believe in democracy.I also ask that you disband the present Parliament and hold a General Election as you and your collegues have shown that you cannot be trusted to govern the country honestly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
